channel.title: Hmmm?
channel.description:
Alright, well my Client won't connect to my server. It connects to numbers, like 127.0.0.0 or something like that. I need to change that, so it linked to my server IP for my Client.
I'm not sure what file to do this in. I tried the Eugi file or whatever, and changed it, but it still gives me 127.0.0.0 when going to connect.
How can I fix this, thanks in advance.

item.title: Hmmm?
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

127.0.0.0
Should be 127.0.0.1

127.0.0.1 is your local host. Go to the following classes and search for 127.0.

Client.Java
EGUI.java
GUI.java

If you don’t have some of those files it’s okay it just means your Client is different and almost everyone’s is. Replace the 127.0.0.1 with your Server’s IP.

Read full topic
